statements: UPDATE advertising_campaigns SET budget = 2000.50, end_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE advertising_campaigns SET target_audience = 'Young Adults', company_name = 'TechSolutions' WHERE campaign_id = 102;
UPDATE advertising_campaigns SET budget = 2000.50, target_audience = 'Young Adults' WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE advertising_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-05-15', end_date = '2022-11-30', budget = 5000.00 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
UPDATE AdCampaigns SET spend = 5000.50, clicks = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PerformanceMetrics SET impressions = 20000, cost = 2500.75 WHERE ad_campaign_id = 2 AND date = '2022-05-15';
UPDATE AdCampaigns SET spend = spend + 500, clicks = clicks + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PerformanceMetrics SET cost = (impressions * 0.005) + (clicks * 0.1) WHERE ad_campaign_id = 1 AND date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE advertising_campaigns SET budget = 15000.00 WHERE campaign_id = '8572ebbc-1b2a-45ea-9160-1993fd2a7d93';
UPDATE campaign_metrics SET impressions = 500, clicks = 50 WHERE campaign_id = '8572ebbc-1b2a-45ea-9160-1993fd2a7d93' AND date = '2022-03-15';
UPDATE advertising_campaigns SET budget = 15000.50, status = 'Active' WHERE campaign_id = 'fd449945-70cd-4026-94b9-eebd8c6b5e4c';
UPDATE campaign_metrics SET impressions = 5000, clicks = 200, revenue = 2500.75 WHERE campaign_id = '2b2a4b3d-63f3-42b0-915a-1c6bbe5a1b74';
UPDATE AdvertisingCampaign SET budget = 1500.00 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Clicks SET click_count = 10, click_date = '2022-12-15' WHERE click_id = 5;
UPDATE AdvertisingCampaign SET budget = 15000.00 WHERE campaign_id = 1001
UPDATE Impressions SET impression_count = 500, impression_date = '2022-05-30' WHERE campaign_id = 1002
UPDATE AdvertisingCampaigns SET budget = 5000, status = 'active' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE UserFeedback SET feedback = 'Great campaign!', rating = 5 WHERE campaign_id = 3 AND user_id = 101;
UPDATE AdvertisingCampaigns SET status = 'Paused' WHERE id = 12345
UPDATE ClickData SET device = 'Mobile' WHERE user_id = 54321
